recentChanges: Installed RVC (Retrieval-based Voice Conversion) locally on D:\RVC with PyTorch + CUDA 12.4
Created RVC API wrapper (rvc_api.py) on port 7870 for voice conversion
Created Audio Analysis API (audio_analysis_api.py) on port 7871 with: pitch correction (auto-tune), melody extraction (vocals to MIDI), karaoke scoring, emotion detection, audio classification
Wired both APIs to CodedSwitch backend via server/services/audioAnalysis.ts and server/services/speechCorrection.ts
Both APIs running and tested - GPU (GTX 1050 Ti) working with half-precision
Created startup scripts: start-api.bat and start-analysis-api.bat
notes: RVC and Audio Analysis APIs are LOCAL-ONLY (run on user's machine with GPU). They provide: voice cloning/conversion, auto-tune, melody-to-MIDI, karaoke scoring, emotion detection, audio classification. CodedSwitch backend gracefully falls back if APIs unavailable. User still needs to add voice models (.pth files) to D:\\RVC\\assets\\weights\\ for voice conversion to work.
